text: “Ngankugalagatila inepe kunneka Jwalakwe ikaweje mena gampeleche - jenumanja ni achatati wenu - ganganatulusya pa galakwego Allah umboni uliose (wakulosya kuti gelego mena ga milungu jakuwajilwa kujigalagatila), pangali ulamusi wine ikaweje wa Allah pe, (Jwalakwe) alamwile yanti nkasin’galagatila chinepe ikaweje Jwalakwe. Jele ni Dini jagoloka, nambo wandu wajinji ngakumanyilila.”
